statements.select: SELECT Ave_Load_Hms AS EntradaHornoMinHMS, Ave_load_Seconds As EntradaHornoSec, EndDate AS Fecha, CASE when DATEPART(dw,EndDate)=1 then 7 else DATEPART(dw,EndDate)-1 end AS NumDia, DATEPART(ISO_WEEK, EndDate) as NumSemana FROM KeysExtractsCorpVersion WHERE EndDate BETWEEN #DateIni# AND #DateEnd# AND Location_Code = #NumTienda# ORDER BY EndDate
